title: T-203 Mayo Cut Plug Baseball Comics
author: JamesGallo

posts.post_title: T-203 Mayo Cut Plug Baseball Comics
posts.post_content:
I have for sale the following T-203 Mayo Cut Plug Baseball comics.  These cards are from 1900 and feature a unique image with a Baseball heading.  A very cool, interesting, early and tough set that is very undervalued.  All prices including shipping, insurance is extra if desired.  Paypal ok, but would do a bit better on the prices if paying with check or money order.  

A Fine Slide SGC 30 $100

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbcafineslide30.jpg[/IMG]
